snippet: Pianists from the Mason Gross School of the Arts at Rutgers University will perform seldom-heard pieces by composers including Schubert, Czerny and Liszt at Weill Recital Hall.
lead_paragraph: Pianists from the Mason Gross School of the Arts at Rutgers University will perform seldom-heard pieces by composers including Schubert, Czerny and Liszt at Weill Recital Hall.

headline.main: From Diabelli, a Variety of Variations
